com.phunware.advertising

Class PwAdLoader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.advertising.PwAdLoader<T>

  • public abstract class PwAdLoader<T>
extends Object
    Used for requesting multiple ads to display. Currently only supported for native ads.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener<T>
      Implement this interface to be notified of ad loading events.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PwAdLoader

    • Method Detail

      • multiLoad

        @Deprecated
public abstract void multiLoad(android.content.Context context,
                                           PwAdRequest request,
                                           int maxAdsRequested,
                                           PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener<T> callback)
        Deprecated. Use loadAds(Context, int, PwAdLoaderListener) instead.
        Requests multiple ads, posting them to PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener when ads are returned from server.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context to use while build request
        request - the request parameters to be submitted to the ad server
        maxAdsRequested - the maximum number of ads to be returned. Fewer ads may be returned based on inventory availability.
        callback - the listener to be notified when request succeeds/fails

      • getNativeAdLoader

        public static PwAdLoader<PwNativeAd> getNativeAdLoader()
        Get loader for native ads.
        Returns:
        loader for native ads.

      • loadNativeAds

        public static PwAdLoader<PwNativeAd> loadNativeAds(android.content.Context context,
                                                   String zone,
                                                   int maxAdsRequested,
                                                   PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener<PwNativeAd> callback)
        Requests multiple native ads, posting them to PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener when ads are returned from server.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context to use while build request
        zone - (required) native ad zone ID
        maxAdsRequested - the maximum number of ads to be returned. Fewer ads may be returned based on inventory availability.
        callback - the listener to be notified when request succeeds/fails

      • loadAds

        public abstract void loadAds(android.content.Context context,
                             int maxAdsRequested,
                             PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener<T> callback)
        Requests multiple ads, posting them to PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener when ads are returned from server. Zone must be set.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context to use while build request
        maxAdsRequested - the maximum number of ads to be returned. Fewer ads may be returned based on inventory availability.
        callback - the listener to be notified when request succeeds/fails

      • getZone

        public abstract String getZone()
        Get zone ID set for ad loader. Required to request ad data.
        Returns:
        zone ID

      • setZone

        public abstract void setZone(String zone)
        Set zone ID for ad loader.
        Parameters:
        zone - zone ID

      • updateLocation

        public abstract void updateLocation(Double latitude,
                                    Double longitude)
        Set the location coordinates for geo-targeting.
        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude in decimal degrees
        longitude - the longitude in decimal degrees

      • isTestMode

        public abstract boolean isTestMode()
        Return if in test mode. In test mode, sample ad data is returned from the server.
        Returns:
        true if in test mode.

      • setTestMode

        public abstract void setTestMode(boolean testMode)
        Set test mode. In test mode, sample ad data is returned from the server.
        Parameters:
        testMode -

      • getKeywords

        public abstract List<String> getKeywords()
        Get keywords passed to ad server.
        Returns:
        list of keywords, or null

      • setKeywords

        public abstract void setKeywords(List<String> keywords)
        Set keywords passed to ad server.
        Parameters:
        keywords - list of keywords

      • cancelLoad

        public abstract void cancelLoad()
        Cancel request for ads. This will cause PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener.onFail(PwAdLoader, String) to be called if ads are currently loading. Nothing happens if ads are not loading.

      • getNativeAd

        protected PwNativeAd getNativeAd(android.content.Context context,
                                 PwAdRequest request)
